Class R2RestRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.r2.R2RestRequestBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncRequestBuilder<GenericRecord,com.linkedin.r2.message.rest.RestRequest>

    public class R2RestRequestBuilder
extends Object
implements AsyncRequestBuilder<GenericRecord,com.linkedin.r2.message.rest.RestRequest>
    Build RestRequest that can talk to restli services

    This basic implementation builds a write request from a single record
